alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Issaquena; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 7:40PM CDT until September 06 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... West central Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... North central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Anguilla, or 10 miles northeast of Rolling Fork, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Louise around 745 PM CDT. Holly Bluff around 750 PM CDT. Yazoo City around 800 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Holmes; Humphreys; Issaquena; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo
